byline.contributor: An earlier version of this article referred incorrectly to the English-language Twitter account that carries Mr. Ai’s comments. It is maintained by supporters; it is not his account.

snippet: For a series of works for W magazine, Ai Weiwei, an artist under surveillance in China, used a computer link-up to guide a photographer around New York.
lead_paragraph: For a series of works for W magazine, Ai Weiwei, an artist under surveillance in China, used a computer link-up to guide a photographer around New York.

headline.seo: Ai Weiwei’s Photo Shoot From China
